definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Electricity will power your coffee machine.
sentences.chinese: 有电可以启动你的咖啡机。

sentences.english: Touching a single live conductor has no effect if the body is isolated.
sentences.chinese: 孤立的人体接触单个有电的导体没有什么影响。

definition: to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
(of a circuit breaker or switch) to trip
to set up an electric circuit/to electrify/to switch on/to be connected to an electricity grid/open telegram
